background_context.situation: Has experience using both the website and app for event management and member engagement.
background_context.environment: Active member of a community organization, often volunteering and participating in committee activities.
background_context.constraints: Limited time to navigate and familiarize with the website features.

goals_motivations.drives: Wants to facilitate member engagement and streamline event registration.
goals_motivations.achievements: Seeks to improve the usability of the website to enhance user experience for new and existing members.

behaviors_patterns.current_work: Primarily uses the app for organizing events but relies on the website for administrative tasks.
behaviors_patterns.habits: Frequently checks the calendar and member directory; uses the app for ease of access.

pain_points_frustrations.obstacles: Difficulty in finding information on the website, such as event registrations and committee descriptions.
pain_points_frustrations.frustrations: Confusing navigation between public and admin views; unclear visibility of important features.

needs_desires.improvements: Desires a more user-friendly website layout that highlights essential features; easier access to event registration and committee information.
needs_desires.expectations: Looking for streamlined communication tools for event cancellations and member directories.

attitudes_beliefs.mental_models: Believes that technology should simplify processes, not complicate them.
attitudes_beliefs.preferences: Prefers intuitive design and clear navigation; values accessibility of information for all members.

technical_comfort.tools_used: Website and mobile app for event management.
technical_comfort.technical_abilities: Comfortable with digital tools but finds some features cumbersome.
technical_comfort.learning_preferences: Prefers hands-on training and immediate application of new tools.

quotes: I think that thing needs to get... more front and center.
It's kind of a roundabout way, but there is a way to do it.
It's just a list of links. It's not very visually engaging.
